title: Total population of Nepal 2024
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Inhabitants in millions, containing a total of 11 data points.
In general Inhabitants in millions has rose over the Year.
Inhabitants in millions is roughly constant from 2014 to 2015, and finally slightly increasing from 2015 to 2024.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2017 and 2018.
Maximum Inhabitants in millions, about 30.36 was reported at Year 2024
The lowest Inhabitants in millions, of value 26.91 was reported at Year 2014
